Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in Azzano, Hotel Cristallo is in the suburbs and close to Policlinico Giambattista Rossi Hospital and Verona Uno. This 4-star hotel is within the vicinity of Fiera di Verona and Porta Nuova.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 94 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. High-speed (wired) Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and bidets. Conveniences include desks and complimentary newspapers, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities such as wireless Internet access (surcharge), a television in the lobby, and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. Planning an event in Azzano? This hotel has 3229 square feet (300 square meters) of space consisting of a conference center and meeting rooms. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request), and free self parking is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.

Located in Azzano, Hotel Cristallo is in the suburbs and close to Policlinico Giambattista Rossi Hospital and Verona Uno. This 4-star hotel is within the vicinity of Fiera di Verona and Porta Nuova.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Policlinico Giambattista Rossi Hospital - 4.2 km / 2.6 mi
Verona Uno - 4.7 km / 2.9 mi
Fiera di Verona - 5.2 km / 3.2 mi
Porta Nuova - 6.7 km / 4.1 mi
Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi - 6.9 km / 4.3 mi
Juliet's Tomb - 7.2 km / 4.5 mi
Teatro Ristori - 7.4 km / 4.6 mi
Castelvecchio - 7.6 km / 4.7 mi
Castelvecchio Museum - 7.6 km / 4.7 mi
Gavi Arch - 7.6 km / 4.7 mi
Arena di Verona - 7.6 km / 4.7 mi
Verona City Hall - 7.6 km / 4.7 mi
Verona Philharmonic Theatre - 7.6 km / 4.7 mi
Equestrian Sporting Club Paradiso - 7.6 km / 4.7 mi
Piazza Bra - 7.6 km / 4.7 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Cristallo is Verona (VRN-Valerio Catullo) - 5.6 km / 3.5 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Hotel Cristallo is Verona (VRN-Valerio Catullo) - 5.6 km / 3.5 mi.
